title: fried courgettes and a borlotti bean, olive and confit tomato broth
description: An Italian-inspired roast served with slow-cooked tomatoes. Lamb rump (also called chump) is a restaurant favourite thanks to its excellent flavour and tenderness - even when cooked quickly as it is here.
ingredients: 2 tomatoes, skinned, quartered and seeds removed
salt and freshly ground black pepper
salt and freshly ground black pepper
50g/2oz canned borlotti beans, rinsed and drained
